org.osmdroid.tileprovider.constants

Class OpenStreetMapTileProviderConstants

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.osmdroid.tileprovider.constants.OpenStreetMapTileProviderConstants

  • public class OpenStreetMapTileProviderConstants
extends Object
    This class contains constants used by the tile provider.
    Author:
    Neil Boyd

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • CACHE_MAPTILECOUNT_DEFAULT

        public static final int CACHE_MAPTILECOUNT_DEFAULT
        Initial tile cache size. The size will be increased as required by calling LRUMapTileCache.ensureCapacity(int) The tile cache will always be at least 3x3.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • NUMBER_OF_TILE_DOWNLOAD_THREADS

        public static final int NUMBER_OF_TILE_DOWNLOAD_THREADS
        number of tile download threads, conforming to OSM policy: http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Tile_usage_policy
        See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • getUserAgentValue

        public static String getUserAgentValue()
        Enables you to get the value for HTTP user agents. Used when downloading tiles
        Returns:
        Since:
        5.0

      • setUserAgentValue

        public static void setUserAgentValue(String val)
        Enables you to override the default "osmdroid" value for HTTP user agents. Used when downloading tiles
        Parameters:
        val -
        Since:
        5.0

      • setCachePath

        public static void setCachePath(String newFullPath)
        Change the root path of the osmdroid cache. By default, it is defined in SD card, osmdroid directory.
        Parameters:
        newFullPath -

      • setCacheSizes

        public static void setCacheSizes(long maxCacheSize,
                 long trimCacheSize)
        Change the osmdroid tiles cache sizes. (note this represents size of the cache on disk, not in memory)
        Parameters:
        maxCacheSize - in Mb. Default is 600 Mb.
        trimCacheSize - When the cache size exceeds maxCacheSize, tiles will be automatically removed to reach this target. In Mb. Default is 500 Mb.
        Since:
        4.4

      • setOfflineMapsPath

        public static void setOfflineMapsPath(String path)
        allows for altering the osmdroid_path variable, which controls the location of where to search for offline tile sources
        Parameters:
        path -
